name: Cosmic Periastron [2022 Bullet Hell Jam]
description:
Terra, Jupiter, Pluto. Roman gods, and modern planets. Within the depths of the Kuiper Belt, however, a timer has been ticking down, with a nearly-forgotten god watching it intently. Orcus, Roman god of death, has patiently waited millennia for the day that was foretold, when he would inherit all of existence.

That day has now come. With speed, firepower, and a guarding entourage of asteroids, Orcus sets out to slay the gods by his hand. However, being a small god with no worship nor mass, gravity is as much an obstacle as his opponents, with their orbits and moons jerking him around like a puppet on a string.

With enough determination, even the gods die. But to a god, death is not the end.
